column1: Flores da Cunha is a municipality in the state of Rio Grande do Sul
It is the largest producer of wines inside Brazil. The Venetian language in its Brazilian form Talian is co-official with Portuguese in Flores da Cunha.
Because of the Altitude of 756 meters above the sea level
column2: The Climate of Flores da Cunha is Oceanic Climate type Cfb. With warm (not hot) to cool summers with some few experiences of snowfall between July and August.
